articles.description: In an emotional, two-day interview, Meat Loaf looks back at the ups and downs of his five-decade saga with the writer of his biggest hits. "We belonged heart and soul to each other," he says. "We didn't know each other. We were each other"
articles.content: Jim Steinman was such a titanic figure in Meat Loaf’s life, that sharing their saga in a single phone call to Rolling Stone after Steinman’s death simply was not possible. It took two long calls acro… [+13358 chars]
